name: group object
desc: GroupObject provides a way to organize multiple renderable objects by grouping them into a single renderable object.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Visibility
properties.desc: The Visibility toggle will turn on or off the visible state of the output objects.
